name: METAMORPHIC (itch)
description:
Drop into a subterranean adventure with lots of...rocks! There's a treasure locked behind a door and a magic rock that just can't get it open. How will this story sort itself out? 

In this debut game short from a small group of Los Angeles-based game developers, explore a puzzle-platformer full of atmosphere, magic sparks, and charming geological features.

Platforms: Mac and Windows

Controls: WASD + (Space or LMB)
